description: This file implements a full React component for a calculator app, including utility functions, state management, UI rendering, and keyboard interaction logic.

methods.name: roundToPrecision(value, decimals = 10)
methods.description: Rounds a number to a fixed number of decimal places to mitigate floating point artifacts.

methods.name: formatResult(value)
methods.description: Formats a number or string for display, trimming trailing zeros.

methods.name: performOperation(aStr, bStr, op)
methods.description: Performs basic arithmetic operations and handles division by zero.

methods.name: isError(input)
methods.description: Checks if the input string indicates an error state.

methods.name: mapKeyToOperator(key)
methods.description: Maps keyboard keys to corresponding calculator operators.

methods.name: App()
methods.description: Main React functional component implementing calculator UI, logic, and keyboard support.

methods.name: handleClear
methods.description: Resets calculator state to initial or clears current input.

methods.name: handleDelete
methods.description: Deletes the last digit from the current input.

methods.name: handleToggleSign
methods.description: Toggles the sign (+/-) of the current input.

methods.name: handlePercent
methods.description: Calculates percentage based on current and previous values.

methods.name: handleDecimal
methods.description: Adds a decimal point to current input if not present.

methods.name: handleDigit
methods.description: Appends a digit to current input, handling leading zeros.

methods.name: handleOperator
methods.description: Sets the current operator and computes intermediate results for chaining operations.

methods.name: handleEquals
methods.description: Calculates and displays the result based on previous value, current input, and operator.

methods.name: handleSqrt
methods.description: Calculates the square root of the current input, with error handling for negative or invalid inputs.

methods.name: handleMemory
methods.description: Handles memory operations: MC, MR, M+, M-, MS.

methods.name: useEffect
methods.description: Sets up keyboard event listeners for calculator controls.

methods.name: handleButtonAction
methods.description: Dispatches actions based on button clicks, mapping to calculation functions.
